explanation.rules:
Table Legend
Horizontal Arrow (Past -> Non-past): Indicates a change from past tense to non-past tense/aspect.
Vertical Arrow (Active -> Passive): Indicates a change from the active voice to the passive voice.

1st Person Singular Affixes
Past Active: -n'
Non-past Active: in-
Past Passive: ɨn-
Non-past Passive: ɨn
3rd Person Singular Affixes
Past Active: -y'
Non-past Active: ——
Past Passive: -∅
Non-past Passive: a-
1. −→: 
• -CV → -C’V (ʂʼ → ʦʼ);
• -V1CC’V2- → -V1CVXC’V2-, VX = (V1 = V2) | a

2. Vertical Arrow above a filled circle:
• -ʔ (-C’V → -CV | __-ʔ); 
• ⃝: (C)VCV- → (C)VVCV-

3. • n → m | __{p, p’} 
• n → ŋ | {k, k’}

4. ‹p, t, k› → ‹b, d, g› | {m, n, ŋ} __

3. n’ → ŋ, y’ → y | C’V__
rule_checklist: Table Legend: Horizontal Arrow (Past -> Non-past): Indicates a change from past tense to non-past tense/aspect. Vertical Arrow (Active -> Passive): Indicates a change from the active voice to the passive voice.

1st Person Singular Affixes: Past Active: -n', Non-past Active: in-, Past Passive: ɨn-, Non-past Passive: ɨn. 3rd Person Singular Affixes: Past Active: -y', Non-past Active: ——, Past Passive: -∅, Non-past Passive: a-
2. Vertical Arrow above a filled circle: • -ʔ (-C’V → -CV | __-ʔ); • ⃝: (C)VCV- → (C)VVCV-
